_comment: defines and configures the builders used to create machine images for this template
_comment1: requires sourcing openrc.sh to get OS_USERNAME, OS_PASSWORD, OS_AUTH_URL, OS_REGION_NAME and OS_USER_DOMAIN_NAME
_comment2: !!openrc.sh must export OS_TENANT_NAME and/or OS_TENANT_ID even if v3 is used (for openstack authorization of builder)
